get.summary: Gets a list of all of the requests from users to become a seller.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The amount of records to return.

get.summary: Gets the amount of requests there are from users to become a seller.

put.summary: Accepts a request to become a seller from a user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user to accept the request for.

scopes.read:seller-service: Read services on your seller profile.
scopes.write:seller-service: Update services on your seller profile.
scopes.write:orders: Create new orders and take action against existing ones.
scopes.read:seller-orders: View orders on your seller profile.
scopes.write:seller-orders: Update orders on your seller profile.
